resources.string: "Allows the app to read your email attachments."
"Allows the app to access your email database, including received messages, sent messages, usernames, and passwords."
"Move is not supported on POP3 accounts."
"Can\'t move because selection contains multiple accounts."
"Messages in Drafts, Outbox, and Sent can\'t be moved."
"One or more attachments in your forwarded message will be downloaded prior to sending."
"There was an error while decoding the message."
"You can set up your account in just a few steps."
"Type a valid email address and password."
"You\'re already using this username for the account \"%s\"."
"This password starts or ends with one or more space characters. Many servers don\'t support passwords with spaces."
"You indicated %1$s uses %2$s, but the account may use %3$s"
"Your account is set up and emails are on their way!"
"Automatically download attachments when connected to Wi-Fi"
"Confirm username, password, and account settings are correct."
"Couldn\'t establish the connection to the server due to untrusted or invalid certificate."
"A client certificate is required. Do you want to connect to the server with a client certificate?"
"The server responded with an error. Check your username and password, then try again."
"TLS required but not supported by server."
"Couldn\'t open connection to server due to network or security error."
"You typed an incorrect server address or the server requires a protocol version that Email doesn\'t support."
"You don\'t have permission to sync with this server. Contact your server\'s administrator for more information."
"The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device. Do you want to finish setting up this account?"
"This server requires security features that your Android device doesn\'t support, including: %s"
"You can\'t change an account\'s username. To add an account with a different username, touch Add Account."
"WARNING: Deactivating the Email app\'s authority to administer your device will delete all email accounts that require it, along with their email, contacts, calendar events, and other data."
"%s requires that you update your security settings."
"Account \"%s\" can\'t be synced due to security requirements."
"Account \"%s\" changed its security settings; no user action is required."
"The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device."
"\"%s\" requires that you change your lock screen PIN or password."
"Your lock screen PIN or password has expired."
"You need to change your lock screen PIN or password soon, or the data for %s will be erased. Do you want to change it now?"
"The data for %s is being erased from your device. You can restore it by changing your lock screen PIN or password. Do you want to change it now?"
"The username or password for %s is incorrect. Update them now?"
"Your login to %s failed; the server said: %s Do you want to update your username and/or password?"
"Auto-download attachments to recent messages via Wi-Fi"
"Username, password, and other incoming server settings"
"Username, password, and other outgoing server settings"
"Edit text that you frequently insert when composing emails"

"Only some \"Plus\" accounts include POP access allowing this program to connect. If you\'re not able to sign in with your correct email address and password, you may not have a paid \"Plus\" account. Launch the web browser to gain access to these email accounts."
"Before setting up this email account, visit the T-Online website and create a password for POP3 email access."
"Require an idle device to lock its screen"
"Limit the number of calendar events synced"
"I\'ll read this later and get back to you."
"Let\'s set up a meeting to discuss this."
"Background sync for this account is disabled while\ roaming."
"Select your account from the list below:"
"The End time can\'t be in the past. Please change the End time to a future time."
"The End time can\'t be earlier than the Start time. Change the End time again."
"Send Out of Office auto-replies to senders in my contacts list"
"Send Out of Office auto-replies to anyone outside my organization"
"You haven\'t written an auto-reply message.An empty message will be sent if you leave it blank. Other specified Out of Office settings will still work.Continue?"
"Send to senders in my contacts list"
"Reply to addresses outside of your organisation"
"The account \"%s\" will be removed from Email."
"Removing this account will delete all its messages, contacts, and other data from your phone."
"Send email from this account by default"
"Send email from this account by default."
"Send email from this account by default."
"This attachment is too large to download over a mobile network. You can download it the next time you connect to a Wi-Fi network."

"---------- Forwarded message ---------- %s From: %s %s Date: %s %s Subject: %s %s To: %s %s Cc: %s
"
"One or more files not attached. Limit %1$s."
"Your email exceeds %1$s. Your email account might not support this."
"Unable to add file. Email size will exceed the %1$s limit."
"There\'s no text in the message subject"
"There\'s no text in the message body."
"No app can open this attachment for viewing."
"Can\'t forward because attachments are not fully downloaded, please download attachments first."
"You\'re all done! Please enjoy your day."
"Search is not supported on this account."
"Pictures from this sender will be shown automatically."

string-array.name: sync_status
string-array.item: "You don\'t have Wi-Fi connectivity, whether to continue the synchronisation?"

resources.string: "This account isn\'t set up to sync automatically.\nTouch Sync now to sync mail once, or Change sync settings to set up this account to sync mail automatically."
"Can\'t move because selection contains multiple accounts."
"Your device doesn\'t have enough storage space to sync."
"Stop displaying inline images from senders you previously allowed."
"Touch a sender image to select that conversation."
"Touch & hold to select one conversation, then touch to select more."
"Changes you make to all apps and accounts, not just Gmail, will be synchronised to the web, your other devices, and your %1$s."
"OK, let me get back to you"

string-array.name: prefSummaries_snapHeader
string-array.item: "Always show message actions at the top of the screen"
"Only show message actions at the top of the screen when rotated to portrait"
"Don\'t show message actions outside the message header"

resources.string: "All the searches you\'ve previously performed will be removed."
"Always bcc myself when composing, replying, and forwarding"
"Auto download remaining body when scrolling down"
"You need a network connection to use this application. Please turn on mobile network or Wi-Fi in Settings."
"The version of Exchange application is not the same with Email, continue?"
"The version of Exchange application is not the same with Email"
"You don\'t have Wi-Fi connectivity, whether to continue the synchronisation?"
"This file is not allowed to upload or share because the file is DRM protected!"
"Can\'t add recipients over %1$d at one time."
"You need a network connection to use this application. Please turn on WiFi in Settings."
"Swipe down to refresh manually when roaming"
"Not all files have been downloaded. Forward without downloading files?"
"Storage permission is needed to open this file"
"To sync, allow Exchange services to access Calendar"
"To sync, allow Exchange services to access Contacts"
"To save, allow Exchange services to access storage"
"To add attachments, allow Email permissions to access storage"
"To check ringtone, allow Email permissions to access storage"
